Articles.Content:
So I know this is outdated but it seems to at least get the .cfg side of things correct.

MODULE
{
    name = InternalSeat
    seatTransformName = Kerbal1
    portraitCameraName = KerbCam1
    allowCrewHelmet = false
}

Works with the exception of portraitCameraName. Is anyone else having this issue? Has anyone determined another way to relocate the portrait camera?

What are you trying to do? Make your own internal space or change an existing one?

The only way to change the location of a camera in an internal space is by changing the location of the object/mesh in the model file.

In your example it's the object/mesh called KerbCam1.

That is my workspace. I am creating a new internal space. KerbalCam1 is an empty transform currently highlighted. Kerbal1 locates the kerbal successfully. KerbalCam1 does not appear to relocate the camera.
You need an actual unity camera component on it when it's a portrait cam.
